represents a recipient in a recipient select view and provides methods for checking the email address validity, getting/displaying the recipient's name or address, and managing the recipient's crypto status.
provides functionality to add child views to a foldable container view.
notifies the listener when the token associated with the recipient select view has changed.
provides functionality to switch between different child views with optional animations.
provides a listener to notify when a switch between child views in a ViewSwitcher has completed.
listens for changes in the hierarchy tree of a view group and handles touch interaction for web views.
displays the status of message encryption in K-9 mail application.
saves the state of a FoldableLinearLayout to a Parcel object.
provides methods for setting up and animating the transition between views in a LinearViewAnimator in an Android application.
saves the state of additional headers visibility for a message header in a Parcel object.
provides methods to get styled colors from an Android theme or context.
provides functionality for selecting and managing recipients in an email app, including auto-completion, display of cryptographic information, and handling of touch events.
provides methods for setting and retrieving the selected crypto status in a CryptoModeSelector view.
provides a way to obtain a colored shape drawable object.
com.fsck.k9.widget.list: manages and updates the message list widget for the K9 email client in Android.
creates a factory for displaying messages in a widget for the K-9 email application.
provides methods for creating and managing a list view used to display mail messages in a widget for a messaging application.
com.fsck.k9.notification: manages and displays notifications related to certificate errors for email accounts in the K-9 Mail app.
manages notifications for failed email sending attempts in the K-9 Mail application.
creates notification content for email messages based on account information.
generates unique notification IDs for various email-related events in the K9 email client.
handles and manages various types of email notifications in the K9 email app.
handles building and creating device notifications for the K9 mail app.
manages notification data and provides methods to interact with the data.
manages notifications for new email messages in a specified email account.
provides methods to handle notifications for wearable devices in the K9 email app.
manages authentication error notifications for email accounts in K-9 Mail application.
manages and displays notifications related to fetching and sending emails in the K-9 Mail app for specific email accounts and folders.
manages the process of creating and removing notifications for the K-9 mail client in Java.
creates various PendingIntents for performing actions related to notifications in the K-9 Mail app.
configures and manages lock screen notifications for K-9 Mail.
provides a method to retrieve the group key for a notification related to a specific email account.
provides methods to delete all messages in a specific email account and perform actions on notifications related to email accounts.
provides methods for creating and manipulating notification results, including creating and replacing notifications, and determining whether a notification should be cancelled.
com.fsck.k9.power: provides methods for registering and unregistering a receiver for device idle state changes and returns an instance of a DeviceIdleManager class depending on device support and app whitelisting.
checks whether the device supports idle mode and whether the app is whitelisted from battery optimizations.
resets the mail service if the device is not in idle mode.
manages device idle events through registering and unregistering the device idle receiver.
provides empty implementations for the `registerReceiver()` and `unregisterReceiver()` methods of the superclass, effectively doing nothing.
com.fsck.k9.preferences: handles the preferences and settings for email folders in the K9 mail client.
contains a method to convert a string value into a directory path.
upgrades a setting in the Global Settings of an email client based on the value of a specific boolean setting.
handles the parsing and storage of Boolean preferences in the K-9 email client.
provides methods for converting between enum values and their pretty string representations.
allows for the exporting of email app settings to a file or URI with a unique export file name.
defines a language setting and provides a method to convert a string value to that setting.
provides a way to parse string values into corresponding Java Enum values.
manages a checkbox list preference in an Android application.

manages and converts email client settings between their internal representation and a string representation used in preference storage, and provides functionality for upgrading and modifying those settings.
provides a method for parsing and validating a time setting string in K9 email client.
provides a method to retrieve any extra settings associated with an imported server setting object.
handles the conversion of color values between human-readable and integer representations.
handles the ringtone setting for a specific email account in the K-9 Mail app.
parses and validates string representation of an integer to determine a delete policy for an email account.
represents an integer preference setting that is constrained to a specified range.
represents and handles the user-selected web font size setting in the K-9 email client.
handles the conversion between a sub-theme setting string value and its corresponding K9 theme object.
provides methods to convert and upgrade global settings for the K9 email client.
parses a string value against a pre-defined mapping.
provides a way to convert a string into an integer and validate the input.
upgrades font size preferences in a specified email client's settings from an old size to a new size.
provides functionality related to storage provider settings for email accounts in the K9 email client.
defines a method for upgrading settings and returning the names of any removed settings.
provides methods for editing and manipulating shared preferences in an Android application.
upgrades the theme and messageViewTheme settings in K9 email app by setting messageViewTheme to use the global theme setting if they are equal.

provides methods for parsing, converting, and retrieving default and string representations of setting values.

provides methods for handling optional email address settings.
provides methods to retrieve, store, and edit preferences in the app and returns a singleton instance of the storage for a given context.

represents a setting that takes a string value and provides a method to parse a string into the setting.

provides methods to handle and convert theme settings for the K9 email client in Java.

handles queries for messages in the inbox section of the email provider.
extracts the account number associated with a given email message.
extracts the value of the "count" field from an object.

extracts the chip color of a message's account holder.
determines whether a given email message has any attachments or not.
provides methods to retrieve message info holders and populate them with information from local messages retrieved from an email account and folder.
provides methods for managing temporary decrypted files, generating content URIs, and opening files from a Uri.
creates a monitored cursor for a given URI and schedules a task to close it after 30 seconds if it has not already been closed.

handles queries, inserts, deletes, updates, and MIME types for the messages in the K-9 email client app.

provides a way to query unread messages for a specific email account.
extracts the database ID of a message stored in a MessageInfoHolder object.
cleans up old temporary files and unregisters a file cleanup receiver if all files are deleted.
extracts the sender information from a message.

handles the updating and deleting of unread email widgets in the K-9 email client app.
extracts the sent date of a message.
extracts the URI field from a MessageInfoHolder object.
overrides and modifies the behavior of the getColumnIndex methods for column name mapping in a specific class.
